data.name: Poor Lucas and the Evil Duke Demo
data.detailed_description:
Poor Lucas and the Evil Duke is a Metroidvania with action and RPG elements. Jump, slide, wall jump, swim, and battle your way through the Dukedom. Other mechanics include pushing boxes, pulling levers, and swinging on ropes. Enemies drop essences that will eventually unlock stat boosts or spells. Items in the game may be dropped as magic or can be enchanted.

The demo is of the first area of the game. The game is still in development so there still may be some changes by the time the game is completed. I did a good deal of polishing of this area, but could still use some fresh shine before the game releases. I am open to suggestions to improve the quality of the game. Graphics are not my top priority, but gameplay is. I hope you have fun!

Version .07 Update Notes (Demo only) 8/29/2021
-Fixed a couple of bugs
-Added new enemies
-Adjusted enemy essence rewards

Version .06 Update Notes (Demo only) 8/8/2021
-Fixed a couple of bugs
-Rebalanced item enchantments and potions

Version .05 Update Notes (Demo only) 8/5/2021
-Giant overhaul. You'll have to play it to see the difference.
-Changed attack animations
-Changed stat progression
-Overhauled graphics of the Mines area
-Adjusted enemy difficulty
-Many other minor tweaks and adjustments, including performance improvements

Version .03 Update Notes (Demo only) 4/19/2021
-Adjusted and rebalanced all enemies
-Added new items
-Added new enemies
-Adjusted all enemy rewards
-Revamped drop system
-Revamped entire UI
-Some minor visual improvements
-Fixed map error

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 or Later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 5th gen or equivalent or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD5500 or equivilent
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 or Later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 5th gen or equivalent or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD5500 or equivilent
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
